text: Francesco Di Giacomo (22 August 1947 - 21 February 2014) was an Italian singer and musician. He was a member of rock band Banco del Mutuo Soccorso. He was born in Siniscola, Province of Nuoro, Sardinia. Di Giacomo died in a traffic collision on 21 February 2014 in Zagarolo, Province of Rome. He was aged 66. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1947 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Accidental deaths in Italy Category:Italian musicians Category:Italian singers Category:People from Sardinia Category:Road accident deaths Category:Progressive rock singers
title: Francesco Di Giacomo
